original: ngag sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: ngag sgrub ba thabs zhes byed ba

original: gsung rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gsung rdo rje la phyag tshal lo

original: sngar gyi bzhin du stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgoms la /
analyzed: sngar gyi bzhin du stong ba nyid du rnam ba sgom la

original: yi ge pam las byung ba'i sna tshogs padma yi ge aom las bskyed pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: yi ge pam las byung ba sna tshogs padma yi ge aom las skyed ba zla ba dkyil khor ro

original: de'i steng du yi ge hr'i: dmar po yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid snang ba mtha' yas kyi skur bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: de steng du yi ge hr: dmar po yongs su gyur ba las bdag nyid snang ba mtha yas kyi skur bsgom ba byed ste

original: mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya dang ldan pa /
analyzed: mnyam jog gi phyag rgya dang ldan ba

original: thugs rje'i mdog rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: thugs rje mdog rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs ba

original: de nas snying gar zla ba la yi ge h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa gyen du langs te /
analyzed: de nas snying gar zla ba la yi ge hum las byung ba rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga ba gyen du ldang te

original: de'i dbus kyi rtse mo'i steng du yi ge a'a: dmar po bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dbus kyi rtse mo steng du yi ge aa: dmar po bsgom ba byed ba

original: lce'i rtse me la yang yi ge hr'i: dmar po'o //
analyzed: lce rtse me la yang yi ge hr: dmar po

original: 'di ni ngag sgrub pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: di ni ngag sgrub ba thabs so

original: mkhas pa dag las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: mkhas ba dag las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis sgyur
